thread.title: 'Happy f**king Mother's Day': 'Alone' Danniella Westbrook rants after discovering her daughter will spend Sunday with step-mum
thread.title_full: 'Happy f**king Mother's Day': 'Alone' Danniella Westbrook rants after discovering her daughter will spend Sunday with step-mum

author: mirror
title: 'Happy f**king Mother's Day': 'Alone' Danniella Westbrook rants after discovering her daughter will spend Sunday with step-mum
text:
Get soaps   
Distraught Danniella Westbrook has gone on a foul-mouth rant after discovering she will be alone tomorrow as her daughter spends Mother's Day with her step-mum. 
Despite appearing to get the wrong day, the 43-year-old, who just returned from a wild holiday in Marbs, fumed on Twitter yesterday that her teenage daughter would rather spend time with her step-mum over Mother's Day weekend. 
Singling out her young daughter, the mum-of-two wrote: "So my son is working all weekend bless him and my daughter has plans with her step mum like every weekend ! Happy fucking Mother's Day 2 me! 
Earlier she had cryptically tweeted: "Everyone butters their own buns! Trust me I'm sick of baking them and buying them for them! Make ur own money & don't abuse my kindness." Danniella needed to practice on the pole during her holidays (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) Danniella was very emotional (Photo: Twitter) Danniella and son Kai - he is working this weekend (Photo: Rex Features) 
Former cocaine addict Danniella, who confessed she had snorted the drug while pregnant with her son and during her daughter's birth, has two children with ex-husband millionaire businessman Kevin Jenkins. 
Last year Danniella said she decided to do CBB to make her children proud. In a nod to her tumultuous relationship with her kids she said: "I just wanted to make my kids proud of me, I'm sick of them having to defend me. Now they can go out and say, 'That's my mum, that's who she is, she's ok, she's not some messy drug addict'" 
Danniella hit the headlines this month after her rather wild break in Marbs. Danniella with former boyfriend Tom Richards and daughter Jody (Photo: FameFlynet) 
But it wasn't all play as she actress was spotted flailing around on the greasy pole in a club - showing off her sassy moves to shocked punters before she takes part in a new reality show as a madam of a pole dancing club. 
With her hair in tight braids, the former EastEnder had a look of pure concentration as she tried to shimmy up the pole. Showing off her toned tum and legs, Danniella made sure she gave punters an eyeful in her very high shorts. 
It appeared the mum-of-two was a little out of practice as she flailed around the lower end - before triumphing as she managed to mount the silver pole. Old pals Lisa Appleton and Danniella Westbrook party this week (Photo: MsLisaAppleton/Twitter) 
Clad in a sexy top which just about covered her washboard abs, the 43-year-old really got into the swing of things. 
Danniella also said she was feeling "blessed" that she'd managed to turn her life around, writing alongside a selfie: "Super excited to board the plane home to the UK excited to see my babies my mates and get back to work a busy life and no ones wife is a life well lived.. 
"Feeling super blessed at the turn around in my life lately.. hard work determination and never ever letting my problems, my mental health, my bad choices in who I've trusted get the better of me. Read More
